data.name: Cosmic Strike - The last Sub Sector
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist now!

Wishlist now for a 10% discount during launch week!


About the Game

Giant capital ship combat!

3 ship Manufacturers, level them up to get ship discount.
Currently 10+ unique ships, with more on the way!

Crew:

Customise your ships’ crew to affect the stats of your ship. If you want more speed, add a full crew that increases your ships movement. Want more firepower? Add a crew that increases weapon damage and turret rotation. More than 50 crew members to mix and match.

Base building:

Simplistic base building; build the base you want! Build a base that will help you improve your credits gained from missions, reduce repair costs and unlock the ability to gain research points.

Explore:

8 sub-sectors to explore with over 160+ planets

Combat:

Will you survive? Space Boogers! Drones! Mercenaries! And more! 12 different environments to fight hordes of enemies in, with 10 difficulty levels and up to 5 randomly chosen objectives per mission.

Rewards:

Level up your profile and earn rewards from completing missions. Gain tokens from fallen enemies to use on the Spin to win mini-game.

data.short_description: Giant capital ship combat! Equip your crew, choose your ship and rage battle across the stars in this top down 2D strategic shooter. Unravel the story as you fight hordes of enemies, build up your base, and become the fleet commander this sector needs in its darkest hour.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent, Integrated cards also work
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
